text: From that day on, Benny felt a little less shy. Every time he joined in, he made a new friend!
scene: Benny is playing happily amongst the animals in a sunny meadow, smiling and laughing as they chase butterflies together.

character.name: Benny
character.description: A small, fluffy rabbit with big ears and a soft, gray coat. He often hides behind bushes, his eyes wide with curiosity.

moral: Believing in yourself can make you brave and help you find new friends.
